text: Exitos y Recuerdos (English: Hits and Memories) is a compilation album by Mexican-American Tejano pop singer, Selena. == Track listing == #"Baila Esta Cumbia" #"Ya Ves" #"Como La Flor" #"Tengo Gana De Llorar" #"Vuelve A Mi" #"Que Creias" #"Sukiyaki" #"Si La Quieres" #"Besitos" == Charts == Year Chart Peak position 1996 U.S. Latin Albums (Billboard) 13 U.S. Regional Mexican Albums (Billboard) 7 1998 U.S. The Billboard Latin 50 40 == References == Category:1996 albums Category:Selena albums Category:Compilation albums
title: Exitos Y Recuerdos
